title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 68 - Investments In Savings And Loan Service Agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 68 - Investments In Savings And Loan Service Agencies

State Regulations
§ 68.1 - Investments in securities of corporations wholly owned by savings and loan associations
§ 68.2 - Investments in service agencies
§ 68.3 - Investments in capital stock of service agency
§ 68.4 - Investments in the capital notes or debentures of a service agency
§ 68.5 - Revocation, rescission or modification

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 68

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §
379-a[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
